title: Prawn and Veggie Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['350g pasta', '1 small green pepper, chopped', '1 small red pepper, chopped', '3 spring onions, finely chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '25 large pitted black olives, sliced', '120g prawns, cooked', '230g creamy mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon mustard', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vinegar', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
